name: Series JJ "Little Robusto"
additionalNotes: In 2010, friends from around the country participated in Smoke a JJ for JJ Day, raising money for SIDS charities. It was a such a popular social media event that it caught the attention of My Father Cigars, who generously matched the funds raised. This was the beginning of The Little Robusto Project. From retailers to bloggers, there was enough support for the project that My Father Cigars produced a special edition “Little Robusto” Series JJ cigar to raise money for SIDS.
